title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Below are frequently asked questions about Autobus. If you need more information, please contact us.

faqs.answer1: Autobus is an online bus ticket booking platform that allows users to book bus tickets for various routes and destinations.
faqs.question2: How do I book a bus ticket?
faqs.answer2: To book a ticket, simply visit our website, select your desired route, choose a bus operator, and complete the payment.
faqs.answer3: We accept various payment methods such as credit/debit cards, e-wallets, and bank transfers.
faqs.question4: Can I cancel or change my booking?
faqs.answer4: You can cancel or change your booking within the allowed time frame. Please refer to our cancellation policy for details.
faqs.question5: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer5: You can contact our customer support via email, phone, or the contact form on our website.
faqs.question6: Is there a mobile app available?
faqs.answer6: We have a mobile app available for both Android and iOS devices so you can easily book and manage your tickets.
